name: Chase (itch) (GabsLeo)
description:
Chase

A point and click puzzle game made for the Mouse Game Jam.

All the assets and coding were made by me.
Big shoutout to the artists that made the audios that were used in the game:

  • https://freesound.org/people/MATRIXXX_/sounds/657948/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Nick_Simon-Adams/sounds/647614/
  • https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/431118/
